content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Plate Production Facility at Position (-14.5, -48.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (-15.0, -50.0) extracting iron ore.
- Wooden Chest at position (-14.5, -48.5) storing extracted iron ore.
- Stone Furnace at position (-13.0, -48.0) smelting iron ore into iron plates.
- Burner Inserter at position (-14.5, -46.5) transferring materials to the furnace.

### Coal Mining and Smelting Facility at Position (41.5, -80.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (41.0, -82.0) extracting coal.
- Wooden Chest at position (41.5, -80.5) storing extracted coal.
- Stone Furnace at position (43.0, -82.0) smelting iron ore into iron plates.
- Burner Inserter at position (43.5, -80.5) transferring materials to the furnace.

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors Due to Insufficient Inventory Items
- Ensure that you have the required items in your inventory before attempting to insert them into a furnace or any other entity. This will prevent errors related to missing items.

### Warnings for Full Chests
- Regularly check and empty chests at drop positions to avoid warnings about full chests, which can halt mining operations.

### Warnings for Furnaces
- Monitor furnace warnings such as "no ingredients to smelt" to ensure continuous production. Ensure that the necessary raw materials are available for smelting processes.
